inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription, where the Azure SQL DB is to be deployed to

inputs.name: DacpacFile
inputs.label: DACPAC File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of the DACPAC file on the automation agent or on a UNC path like \BudgetIT\Web\Deploy\FabrikamDB.dacpac. Predefined variables like $(Build.StagingDirectory) can be also used

inputs.name: ServerName
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Windows Azure SQL Database connection string like FabrikamSQL.database.windows.net

inputs.name: DatabaseName
inputs.label: Database Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the SQL Server Database

inputs.name: SqlPassword
inputs.label: SQL Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: SQL password for the SQL DB

inputs.name: PublishProfile
inputs.label: Publish Profile
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the Publish profile file on the target machine

inputs.name: AdditionalArguments
inputs.label: Additional Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional SqlPackage.exe arguments that will be applied on the SQL Server like /p:IgnoreAnsiNulls=True /p:IgnoreComments=Trueâ€‹

inputs.name: IpDetectionMethod
inputs.label: Specify firewall rules using
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the IP Address range of the Automation Agent machine pool or select to auto-detect the IP Address of the Automation Agent, where this tasks runs

inputs.name: StartIpAddress
inputs.label: Start IP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The starting IP Address of the Automation Agent machine pool

inputs.name: EndIpAddress
inputs.label: End IP Address
inputs.helpMarkDown: The last IP Address of the Automation Agent machine pool

inputs.name: DeleteFirewallRule
inputs.label: Delete rule after task ends
inputs.helpMarkDown: If selected, deletes the IP Address exception in the Azure SQL DB Firewall after the task ends
